meanings.sent1: The horsepox spread quickly among the herd.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian diagnosed the horse with horsepox.
meanings.sent3: The horsepox outbreak led to a lot of sneezing and coughing in the stable.
meanings.sent4: The horsepox virus rampaged through the barn like a wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The symptoms of horsepox included fever and fatigue in the animals.

meanings.definition: A vaccine derived from horsepox virus.
meanings.sent1: The new horsepox vaccine proved to be effective in preventing the disease.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian administered the horsepox vaccine to all the horses in the stable.
meanings.sent3: The horsepox vaccine was like a shield protecting the horses from illness.
meanings.sent4: The horsepox vaccine acted as a guardian against the viral infection.
meanings.sent5: The horsepox vaccine was a lifesaver for the equine community.

meanings.definition: The study of horsepox and its effects on equine populations.
meanings.sent1: The professor specialized in horsepox research at the university.
meanings.sent2: The students conducted a thorough analysis of horsepox in their project.
meanings.sent3: The research on horsepox was both fascinating and informative.
meanings.sent4: The findings of the horsepox study shed light on equine health.
meanings.sent5: The field of horsepox research aimed to improve horse welfare.
